California sets the bar for what liberty, equality, and justice truly mean in this country. For instance, thanks to your activism last year, we passed landmark legislation that made records of police misconduct available to the public, bringing us a big step closer to police accountability. And there's so much more we can do.

Register now to save your spot at the 2019 ACLU of California Conference & Lobby Day, April 7-8 in Sacramento. Space is limited.

Together, we can build power beyond resistance and create a more equal and just society for all Californians.

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Southern California
